title: Linux like mouse click selection and copy/paste
body: In *Nix systems we can drag select text. Alternatively double left-clicking will smartly select a word/path (etc) boundary. Clicking for the third time selects the entire line. In all instances above it will auto copy to the selection to the clipboard.

comments.body: Drag to copy please.  Pressing enter makes the experience slower than linux.
In the console at least, this should be feasible. As well as supporting the XTerm shortcuts Shift-Ins to paste, etc... as an alternative to Ctrl-V, Ctrl-C etc.
It is a window manager issue.
